summary: A comprehensive tutorial detailing the process of shooting and editing a music video, focusing on different shooting angles, lighting setups, and color grading techniques.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a person wearing a maroon hoodie, standing in front of a backdrop adorned with warm, glowing string lights. The individual appears to be speaking, as indicated by their hand gestures and facial expressions. The scene then transitions to a serene landscape featuring a body of water with a mountainous backdrop, overlaid with the text 'HARV VIDEO AUDIO STUFF,' suggesting a connection to video and audio production. Following this, the video shifts to a close-up of a person with long blonde hair, dressed in a dark top, set against a blurred, abstract background. The text 'HARV VIDEO AUDIO STUFF' remains on the screen, reinforcing the theme of video and audio content creation. The video maintains a consistent focus on the individual and the text, emphasizing the production aspect throughout.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a friendly greeting, as one man announces the topic of his tutorial, promising tips and tricks for filming a music video, and invites listeners to support his channel via the links below. This introduction is followed by a short piece of upbeat, pop-influenced instrumental music.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a person wearing a maroon hoodie, standing in front of a backdrop adorned with warm, glowing string lights, creating a cozy and intimate atmosphere. The individual appears to be speaking, as indicated by their hand gestures and facial expressions. The scene then transitions to a band performing in a studio setting, with three members visible: one playing a keyboard, another on bass guitar, and the third on drums. The studio is equipped with professional audio equipment, and the band members are dressed casually, contributing to a relaxed and creative environment. Following this, the video showcases a close-up of a camera lens placed on a wooden surface, highlighting its design and features. The lens is black with a red ring, indicating it is likely a high-quality model. The video then returns to the person in the maroon hoodie, who continues to speak, maintaining the same warm and inviting ambiance created by the string lights in the background. The sequence of frames suggests a narrative that combines personal storytelling with elements of music and photography, emphasizing a creative and expressive theme.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a male speaker, who sounds friendly and enthusiastic, explaining the "golden rule when filming a music video." He describes capturing lots of footage from different angles, and then introduces a "safety shot," describing it as an angle to cut to when problems arise. He sounds relieved that he got it, as he ended up needing it. He then goes on to describe putting the camera onto a slider mounted on a tripod, and using a Canon lens for a wide shot. The clip ends with the speaker mentioning he's done reviews of the lenses used for the music video, which are linked below.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a person wearing a maroon hoodie standing in front of a backdrop adorned with warm, glowing string lights, creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere. The individual appears to be speaking, as indicated by their hand gestures and facial expressions. The scene then transitions to a close-up of a Canon 35mm camera lens placed on a wooden surface, highlighting its details and design. Returning to the initial setting, the person continues to speak, maintaining the same warm and intimate ambiance. The video then shifts to a band performing in a studio, with a focus on a singer with long hair playing a guitar and singing into a microphone. The background features blue lights and acoustic panels, adding to the professional yet creative environment. The scene alternates between the person in the maroon hoodie speaking and the band performing, emphasizing the connection between the speaker and the musical performance. The video concludes with the band continuing their performance, showcasing their musical talent and the collaborative atmosphere of the studio.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a single male speaker explaining a camera setup, including using a "Zeun Crane Gimbal," a "Canon 35 mil F2 IS" lens, and how he adjusted the aperture for specific shots. He describes walking around a band cherry-picking instruments, followed by capturing the singer with a strip light. The speaker sounds conversational and technical.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man with curly hair and a beard, wearing a maroon hoodie, standing in front of a backdrop adorned with warm, glowing string lights. He appears to be speaking, as his mouth moves and his facial expressions change throughout the video. The scene transitions to a dimly lit room where a drummer, dressed in a black t-shirt with a graphic design, energetically plays a drum set. The drummer's movements are captured in close-up shots, emphasizing the intensity of his performance. The video then returns to the man in the maroon hoodie, who continues to speak, gesturing with his hands to emphasize his points. The scene shifts again to a band setting, where two guitarists, one in a black t-shirt and the other in a dark shirt, play their instruments with focus and precision. The video concludes with a close-up of a keyboard player's hands, showcasing their skill as they play the keys. Throughout the video, the warm lighting and intimate atmosphere create a cohesive and engaging narrative.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker, enthusiastic and informative, describing a camera slider setup and lens choices for a music video shoot, focusing on the drummer's active role and the guitarist's complex solos. He also mentioned handheld and slider shots of details, such as the drummer's cymbals and bassist's keyboard, along with instrument close-ups.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a person wearing a maroon hoodie standing in front of a backdrop adorned with warm, glowing string lights, creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere. The individual appears to be speaking, as indicated by their mouth movements and slight changes in facial expressions. The scene then transitions to a different setting, where another person with long hair and glasses is seen standing in a lush, green forest. This person is dressed in a dark, long-sleeved shirt and is also speaking, using hand gestures to emphasize their points. The forest setting is rich with foliage, and the natural light filtering through the trees adds to the serene ambiance. The video alternates between these two settings, with the first person in the maroon hoodie continuing to speak in front of the string lights, and the second person in the forest continuing their dialogue. The consistent use of hand gestures by both individuals suggests they are engaged in a meaningful conversation or presentation. The video maintains a focus on the speakers, with the backgrounds providing a visually appealing contrast between the warm, intimate setting of the string lights and the natural, tranquil environment of the forest.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker discussing a music video shoot. He describes how he shot the singer of a band in a different environment, using a gimbal and a 35mm lens in a country lane, creating a "walk and follow shot." He mentions that the band preferred their "instruments do the talking," and that they didn't want the video to end up "looking like a Backstreet Boys turned rock band video." No music is heard in this audio clip.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a band performing in a studio setting. The band consists of three members: a bassist, a guitarist, and a drummer. The bassist, wearing a striped sweater, plays the bass guitar while singing into a microphone. The guitarist, dressed in a black t-shirt and camouflage shorts, plays an electric guitar. The drummer, wearing a black t-shirt with a graphic design, plays the drums. The studio is equipped with soundproofing panels, a keyboard, and various musical equipment. The lighting is dim, with a spotlight illuminating the drummer. The video includes close-up shots of the drummer and the guitarist, highlighting their playing techniques. Text appears on the screen, reading "LOVE THAT SILHOUETTE!" with an arrow pointing to the guitarist, emphasizing his silhouette. The video captures the band's performance, showcasing their musical skills and the studio environment.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a single male speaker explaining the lighting setup for the video. He describes the setup as simple, mentioning a two-light arrangement with one behind the camera and another behind the drums, which he wanted to have a "hard light". He expresses a preference for backlighting and summarizes the lighting approach as "very simple, quick and easy".

events_list.video_caption: The video features a person wearing a maroon hoodie with a zipper, standing in front of a backdrop adorned with warm, glowing string lights that create a cozy and inviting atmosphere. The individual appears to be speaking, as indicated by their mouth movements and slight changes in facial expressions. Throughout the video, the person maintains a consistent posture, facing the camera directly. In the upper left corner of the frame, a small inset video appears, showing another person in a different setting, wearing a dark shirt and a backpack. The inset video includes text that reads "LINKED BELOW" with two downward-pointing arrows, suggesting that viewers can find additional content or links related to the video in the description or comments section. The overall setting remains unchanged, with the string lights providing a soft, ambient glow that enhances the visual appeal of the scene.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker explaining that the video was edited in Final Cut using the multicam feature. He then mentions he has a separate video about the multicam feature, which will be linked below. He shifts the conversation to the color grading of the footage, introducing what's coming. A short musical stinger plays.

events_list.video_caption: The video showcases a music production process within a video editing software interface. It begins with a scene of two individuals in a room, one playing a keyboard and the other playing a guitar, surrounded by musical equipment. The editing software displays multiple video tracks, each containing different clips of the musicians performing. The timeline shows the progression of the video, with the playhead moving through various clips. The interface includes editing tools and settings on the right side, such as color correction and audio adjustments. The video transitions to a close-up of a drummer playing a drum set, with the editing software highlighting the drumming sequence. The interface displays color grading options and audio levels, indicating the meticulous editing process. The video concludes with the drummer continuing to play, emphasizing the focus on the musical performance and the detailed editing work being done.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a male speaker talking about an easy video to grade because of "good lighting" and the exposure being "exactly where I wanted it to be," continuing on in a conversational and informative tone about using multicam and advising to watch his previous video for help. He says that the "first thing" he will do is add an instance of "color wheels," further explaining that he is going to drop the exposure a "little bit" because it is "overexposed" and for the purpose of "keeping the noise down." The clip concludes with a soft "click" sound.

events_list.video_caption: The video showcases a young drummer, dressed in a black t-shirt with a white design, energetically playing a drum set in a dimly lit room. The room features a striped wall and a bright light source behind the drummer, creating a dramatic effect. The video is being edited in a video editing software, with the timeline and various editing tools visible on the screen. The editing interface displays color correction tools and other adjustments, indicating that the video is being refined for quality. The drummer's movements are captured in detail, with the drumsticks in motion, and the camera focuses on the performance, highlighting the skill and enthusiasm of the young musician. The video editing process is evident, with the editing software's interface providing a glimpse into the behind-the-scenes work involved in creating a polished final product.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip features a male speaker discussing adding a lookup table to his work, mentioning using "Phantom Luts" and preferring monitor luts. He adds a vignette for a rock band to achieve a contrasty and moody look. He adjusts the vignette's parameters, tweaking the contrast and saturation while turning off the blur for a more natural effect, aiming for a subtle darkening around the edges. The speaker adopts a casual speaking tone throughout the audio clip.

events_list.video_caption: The video showcases a young drummer, dressed in a black t-shirt with a white graphic design, energetically playing a drum set in a dimly lit room. The room features a striped wall and a bright light source behind the drummer, creating a dramatic effect. The drum set includes various cymbals and drums, with the drummer skillfully using drumsticks to create rhythmic beats. The video is being edited in a video editing software, as evidenced by the timeline and editing tools visible on the screen. The editing interface displays color correction tools, indicating adjustments being made to the video's color grading. The video captures the drummer's dynamic movements and the intensity of the performance, with the editing process adding a professional touch to the footage.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip features one male speaker who starts by explaining the addition of a "letterbox" to achieve a specific aspect ratio and emphasizing the need to adjust the footage to avoid cropping. He continues, outlining adjustments to color wheels, pushing shadows to a "teely blue" and warming the midtones. He mentions the absence of sharpening due to the use of sharp lenses and filming in 4K, indicating it was unnecessary. He states that his approach was consistent across all shots, with minor color matching adjustments as needed and encourages feedback.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a person playing the drums in a dimly lit room, wearing a black t-shirt with white text. The scene transitions to a person in a red hoodie standing in front of a backdrop adorned with string lights, creating a warm and cozy atmosphere. The individual appears to be speaking, as indicated by their mouth movements and hand gestures. The video maintains a consistent focus on this person, with the string lights providing a soft, ambient glow in the background. The person's expressions and gestures suggest they are engaged in a conversation or delivering a message. The video concludes with the person still in front of the string lights, maintaining the same warm and inviting atmosphere throughout.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a male speaker expressing hope that the video was helpful and interesting, mentioning a "large back catalog" of videos. He states that YouTube is recommending one video for the listener, and his latest upload will be underneath. The speech has a helpful and informative tone.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a person wearing a maroon hoodie, standing in front of a backdrop adorned with warm, glowing string lights. The individual appears to be speaking, as indicated by their hand gestures and facial expressions. The scene then transitions to a serene landscape featuring a river winding through a lush, green valley, with the sun setting in the background, casting a golden glow over the scene. The text "ALL MUSIC BY HARV" appears at the bottom of the screen, crediting the music composer. The video concludes with a logo displaying "HARV VIDEO AUDIO STUFF," indicating the production company or creator of the content. The overall atmosphere of the video is calm and visually appealing, with a focus on both the speaker and the natural beauty of the landscape.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with an encouraging male speaker promoting his channel, suggesting viewers "hit the blob" and to "help each other out and shoot better videos". This transitions to music with a moody, almost melancholic tone, featuring electronic elements and vocals. The male vocalist can be heard singing "it carries me" and "since I'm alone, my body's holding me".
